class.desc: This class contains information about making a good and strategic read from the stream.

var.name: readAheadAmount
var.desc: An amount, in code units. Tells how much to read ahead of the current index. A minimum read ammount, unless at the end of the stream.

var.name: readBehindAmount
var.desc: An amount, in code units. Tells how much to read behind of the current index. A minimum read ammount, unless at the beginning of the stream.

var.name: minAheadAmount
var.desc: An amount, in code units. Tells how much data must be in the buffer after currentIndex.

var.name: minBehindAmount
var.desc: An amount, in code units. Tells how much data must be in the buffer before currentIndex.

var.name: specificBufferSize
var.desc: An amount, in code units, that tells the capacity of a new BufferElement.

var.name: idealBufferSize
var.desc: An amount, of an ideal total excerpt size. Holding more is unnecessary.

var.name: idealSpecificBufferCount
var.desc: An ideal number of BufferElements to retain. Holding more is unnecessary.
